The question is, can you engineer charisma?

Each and every single law has been distilled to it's pure essence meaning that they will work for anyone.

In this course you'll learn the following secrets:
-The exact science on how to gain, maintain and capitalize on the power of popularity.

-How to avoid resentment from others so that people are always on your side.
-How to properly use momentum to give you "celebrity-like popularity" instantly.

As you go through this course you will see your popularity skyrocket because the course is filled with powerful exercises that push your comfort zone so you can master social situations!
